channel.title: Silva
channel.description: Download area for Silva, the open source content management system.
channel.dc:creator: sylvain

item.title: Dependencies and Extensions for 2.1+
item.description: Silva now uses buildout for maintaining versions of dependencies and extensions.

item.dc:creator: sylvain

item.title: Zope and Python versions for the 2.x series
item.description: The recommended installation method for the Silva 2.x series is buildout. The following listing is provided for reference.
